summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingIt's endless summer with this super-luxurious Estée Lauder Bronze Goddess Powder Bronzer. Sweep it on and the smooth, oil-free powder gives face, shoulders and décolletage a seductive bronze look. Unique oil-control complex keeps skin shine-free and comfortable.
details: DetailsBenefitsSilky and luxuriousNatural, shine-free colorFormulated WithoutOilItem 2583108IngredientsTalc, C12-15 Alkyl Ethylhexanoate, Zinc Stearate, C9-15 Fluoroalcohol Phosphate, Methyl Methacrylate/Glycol Dimethacrylate Crosspolymer, Alumina, Lauroyl Lysine, Pentaerythrityl Tetraethylhexanoate, Caprylyl Glycol, Water\Aqua\Eau, Bisabolol, Panthenyl Triacetate, Hexylene Glycol, Bht, Potassium Sorbate, Phenoxyethanol, Farnesyl Acetate, Farnesol, [+/- Mica, Iron Oxides (Ci 77491), Iron Oxides (Ci 77492), Iron Oxides (Ci 77499), Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Carmine (Ci 75470), Ultramarines (Ci 77007), Yellow 5 Lake (Ci 19140)].Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details

reviews.headline: I love this bronzer
reviews.comments: I love this bronzer!

reviews.headline: I will buy for sure.
reviews.comments: Love the glow

reviews.headline: I love this bronzer I've been using it for over 10 years
reviews.comments: Every time I try something else I regret it and I go back to buying this bronzer, it blends in so well on the skin and has defeat color options.

reviews.headline: Great Tan
reviews.comments: Finally a product that lives up to its name, Bronze Goddess, definitely feeling it. This product is light and only takes a few strokes but makes such a difference in my appearance. So did I say that I Love it, and it lasts forever.

reviews.headline: Amazing!!!
reviews.comments: Enough with the flavor of the Tik tok moment brands. Im tired of finding a porudct I like for it to discontinue or waste money of junk. This is another solid product by a long standing brand. The bronzer in 02 medium blends beautifully and looks great no matter where I put it

reviews.headline: Made my day!!
reviews.comments: I was so happy I came across Bronze Goddess again. I used it many years ago and was buying the drugstore bronzers lately. I was at Ulta walking around and saw this and could not pass it up. Love it and lasts long.

reviews.headline: Wow! Just get it!
reviews.comments: Such an incredible bronzer. Purchased in medium. It has been so versatile, using both as a bronzer and some days just as blush. Absolutely incredible and last for hours in the hot Florida heat Estee Lauder kind of fell off my radar, but have been going back to the try and true brands. Well, they may like excitement their products work.

reviews.headline: Best bronzer out there
reviews.comments: This is by far hands down the best bronzer i have ever used . I have fair light skin with cool undertone and the medium color blew me away how sunkissed and natural it looks on me. I will only use this bronzer from now on. Love it :)

reviews.headline: Color has changed
reviews.comments:
I always wore #1 and it was perfect for me.
The shades have changed!  #1 is barely noticeable on me now.  It's too light!
Horrible.

reviews.headline: Pretty but odd shades
reviews.comments: I really like the formula and finish of this bronzer. It's not sparkly or orange or muddy or chunky, and it's very fine and silky so it melts in really well and doesnt look dry or powdery or accentuate fine lines. The tones are really tought to figure out, though… I have fair/light slightly olive skin and the lightest shade is barely a bronzer, it just looks like a badly matched powder foundation. Medium is super dark with a brick red/brown undertone, medium deep is somehow lighter than medium (?) and much warmer, almost yellow… so I have to wear medium deep and be really careful not to use too much. They definitely need to offer a light/medium shade to bridge the gap. Great formula.

reviews.headline: "Light" shade has changed and is lighter.
reviews.comments:
I bought my usysl sgade if light bronze powder and it is now lighter.
Ive used this bronzer in light, for the past 10 years too.

reviews.headline: Beautiful, but pricey
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this bronzer. I have shade Light, which is a beautiful, almost cool toned shade that can be used as a contour or a bronzer on fair-light skin tones. The only downside is the price. The Milani Silky Matte Bronzer is almost a perfect dupe. Despite the price, the pan is massive, and although I've used this everyday for almost a year, I still haven't hit pan. Love this product!

reviews.headline: I love it
reviews.comments: I love it

reviews.headline: Light goes on VERY LIGHT
reviews.comments: I am 1W2 or 1W1 depending on the season in Double Wear. The Light shade barely shows up on me. I mean BARELY. Do yourself a favor and get the MEDIUM.

reviews.headline: No
reviews.comments: Not deep enough

reviews.headline: No longer has shimmer - barely there color
reviews.comments: Formula has changed and it no longer has any shimmer to it.  I have used the light color for years and now the formula barely has any color! So disappointing

reviews.headline: My favorite brozer
reviews.comments: Long wearing beautiful bronze color- doesn't look muddy or dirty on- looks like a glow! I won't ever use any other bronzer.

reviews.headline: Best Bronzer on the market
reviews.comments: I absolutely love the bronze goddess powder. It looks almost air brushed when I apply it. It provides a natural tan glow! Blends so well!

reviews.headline: Sun Kissed
reviews.comments:
I love this product because it is a lightweight bronzer that gives your face a sun kissed look.
And if you are like me and need moisturizer before makeup this product cuts the shine and leaves you looking blessed.

reviews.headline: Love it!!
reviews.comments: Though this is on the pricy side, it's so worth it. I've been using this bronzer for three years and I still haven't hit the pan! It shows up beautiful in photos and super versatile. I use it as an eyeshadow and nose contour as well as body shimmer!! This bronzer gives such a natural glow to your face. 10/10 AMAZING!!!

properties.name: Cons

values.label: I do not like the brush that comes with it

display_values: I do not like the brush that comes with it

media.headline: No
media.caption: Really would like a refund for all products damaged my skin

media.headline: SO many compliments!
media.caption: 01 Light (great color, nice shimmer but no glitter)

faceoff_positive.comments: FINALLY Estée Lauder has started making my favorite bronzer again!! Used it for years but then they changed the color and added glitter. NOW, the current version of the 01 Light is the PERFECT color on my fair/medium skin with brown hair/eyes. I can't go out tanning, so I rely on this over my BareMinerals foundation.   Has a slight "frost" shimmer to it, but not glitter!  I get compliments on it all the time!  HOWEVER, the MEDIUM 02 does have SOME GLITTER in it, so I returned it even though I liked the color.  I'm a 43 yo girl, so past the glitter phase...not a lot of glitter, but too much for me (see pics).  Ordering a second LIGHT 01 I love it so much (even after using Nars, Hoola, etc).  I spare no expense to get a "good" no-makeup look and I LOVE this 2018 version of the Light bronzer! Finally!!
faceoff_positive.headline: SO many compliments!

faceoff_negative.comments: I received this as a sample when I purchased Estee Lauder night recovery serum. I thought it would be an awesome little bonus, but no matter what I do I cannot get this bronzer to work for me! It has so little pigmentation it's a joke-I've had better bronzers that were one tenth of the price. I have to dig to get any product onto my brush, even when I swatch with my fingers the color barely shows up! It also has huge chunks of glitter, which I just don't understand why that would be in a luxury product to begin with. Overall, disappointed with this, I will not buy this and will stick with my PF Butter bronzer.
faceoff_negative.headline: barely any color payoff-don't understand the good reviews!
